nodes.text: Tsorkeg was a male Jawa living during the Galactic War. Tsorkeg and three other Jawas, Izzar, Hadiir and Mnek, worked as scrap merchants during the conflict.
Tsorkeg was added to the Star Wars: The Old Republic Cartel Market as a vendor who sells customizatons for Cartel Market companions for Jawa Scraps on both Republlic and Imperial fleets.
